data.name: Legend Exteriors LLC
data.address: 325 storage doors at Security Self Storage.

reviews.text:
We telephoned Jon with Legend Exteriors for a quote on a huge project at my workplace. Prepping and painting over 325 storage doors at Security Self Storage.
He headed right over to our Waxahachi location and was eager to help, great attention to detail and knowledgeable with process of job needed. The following day he returned with a few men to walk property and gather more info on our vision for completed job. Pleased to know that the efficiency, eagerness to work, and high quality materials i

Over the last 3 years we've had trouble finding contractors that actually do what they say they're  gonna do. Gunnar Holt from Legend Exteriors is the best when it comes to customer satisfaction. He bent over backwards to help us out and has done a bang up job putting a new roof on our house and repair to our barns that we're damaged in wind/hail storms. You can trust Legend Exteriors with your construction needs!

Jeremy Lott was fantastic to work with! We had a missing vent cover and needed it replaced. He did a full roof inspection, and even knowing that we have good insurance, did not try to upsell us at all. He provided good information and a quote to replace one vent or all of them with metal ones, as the plastic ones don't hold up well in the Texas heat and storms. We decided to replace them all with metal. The price was very reasonable and the roofer  was very meticulous. They ensured the new vents

Paxton Holt and his project manager Richard McVay with Legend Exteriors LLC did an awesome job on our roof and gutters. They stuck by my husband and I through the entire process, even when the insurance company kept denying claims and were playing hard ball, they came through with incredible results.

If you're going through this or you're about to, call these gentlemen. They will do it right the 1st time and give you honest feedback! That in itself was reassuring for me!

10 months ago we had a hail storm. A week later there was a knock at my door from a roofer. That roofing company said that I had hail damage, and suggested that I file a claim. I did so, and the adjuster came out. While the insurance said that I had damage on my fence, vents, and gutters it did not touch my shingles. After the insurance cut me a check, and that roofer realized the roof would not be getting replaced, I never saw them again.

Ronnie. & Paxton were extremely helpful explaining process & moving forward.  Start to finish, within 1 week.  They took care of all gutters & complete fence restaining.  Cannot say enough with our satisfaction & job performance.  Roof shingles are way better than previous ones.  Absolutely great job!  See the roof, gutters, & fence at 319 Choctaw Trl.
Mickey
Loved dealing with Jon. They were very helpful and did everything they could to make sure I was happy. Will definitely use them again!

This is a great company I have used them 2 different times and they performed a great job on time everything was just the way I wanted it done  I would refer this company to anybody they will do a great job And i will definitely use them again
Very professional and quality service. Easy communication and follow up. Highly recommend Ronnie and his crew.

I highly recommend Jon and his team to everyone! They worked fast and efficiently. The negotiation was well explained and he was willing to reassure us with every question we have for him.

I am very pleased with Jon and his team! They worked fast and efficiently. The negotiation was well explained and he answered all our questions.
